data.name: Presentation
desc: This service is a presentation that is available from a PresentationDocument via the XPresentationSupplier interface.

properties.name: CustomShow
desc: If this string is not empty, it contains the name of a customized show that is used for the presentation.

properties.name: FirstPage
desc: If this string is not empty, it contains the name of the page where the presentation is started.

properties.name: IsAlwaysOnTop
desc: If this property is set to TRUE, the window of the presentation is always on top of all other windows.

properties.name: IsAutomatic
desc: If this property is TRUE, all pages are changed automatically.
This overrides the properties of the pages.

properties.name: IsEndless
desc: If this property is set to TRUE, the presentation is repeated endlessly.

properties.name: IsFullScreen
desc: If this property is set to TRUE, the presentation runs in full-screen mode.

properties.name: IsLivePresentation
desc: With this property, you can set the presentation to live mode.
Implementations that have no live mode capability may ignore this property and always return false.

properties.name: IsMouseVisible
desc: If this property is TRUE, the mouse is visible during the presentation.

properties.name: Pause
desc: is the duration of the black screen after the presentation has finished.
If this is set to 0, no black screen is shown.

properties.name: StartWithNavigator
desc: If this is set to TRUE, the Navigator is opened at the start of the presentation.

properties.name: UsePen
desc: If this is TRUE, a pen is shown during presentation.
You can draw on the presentation with this pen.
